title: The Matrix body copy typeface
content:
Can anyone ID the typeface used for the end credits/copy of The Matrix?  
The typeface for the line “Everything that has a beginning has an end”

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225944im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TheMatrixRevolutions_4857.jpg)

 [‹ custom typeface? Need Help Please...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225944/http:/typophile.com/node/50592 "Go to previous forum topic") [A beautiful serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081019225944/http:/typophile.com/node/50584 "Go to next forum topic")
author: McDung
